Allows you to mass delete messages in your server. DEFAULT: 25 MSGS

!purge @user
!purge [number]
!purge bots [number]
!purge commands [number]
!purge mentions [number]
!purge images [number]
!purge links [number]
!purge invites [number]
!purge text [number]
!purge embeds [number]
!purge emojis [number]
!purge startswith [content]
!purge endswith [content]
!purge includes [content]
!purge match [content]
